content:
Junior forward Brady Manek shoots the ball during the game against William  Mary Tribe Nov PERIOD   PERIOD

The Sooners defeated MarylandEastern Shore  on Thursday night to improve to  on the season PERIOD

Here are three takeaways from the win

The Hawks led at the half due to redhot three point shooting

The Sooners led by as much as  during the first half but the Hawks stayed within striking distance and would take a  lead late in the half in large part due to their redhot shooting from beyond the arc PERIOD Backtoback trifectas cut the 12point deficit to six in the matter of seconds and a few additional threepointers thrusted the Hawks into the lead in the waning seconds of the first half PERIOD MarylandEastern Shore was 8for14 from deep in the first half and 14for32 on the game PERIOD

Doolittle was perfect from the floor

The Sooners lone senior was excellent once again on Thursday night leading all scorers with  points on a perfect 7for7 night from the floor PERIOD Doolittle also finished the night with six rebounds three assists and three steals PERIOD

The Sooners success from the freethrow line continued

With the Sooners ahead  in the final seconds of the win the Sooner crowd chanted one name into the air Read. the chant came immediately after sophomore Read Streller knocked down a pair of freethrows from the line topping off the Sooners impressive second half performance against the Hawks that happened in part due to the teams success from the stripe PERIOD The Sooners were 23for27 from the line on Thursday following a 16for20 performance against William  Mary PERIOD

Oklahoma will take on Stanford in Kansas City on Monday at  p.m CT

title: OU men's basketball: 3 takeaways from Oklahoma's 91-64 win over Maryland-Eastern Shore | Sports | oudaily.com
